result.name: european-social-fund
result.notes: The European Social Fund dataset is used to supply information to nine jobcentre plus regions which enables them to produce the interim claims and project closure reports necessary to enable jobcentre plus to receive the appropriate European Social Fund funding. The data includes financial and geographic information.

organization.name: department-for-work-and-pensions
organization.title: Department for Work and Pensions
organization.description:
The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for welfare and pension policy and is a key player in tackling child poverty. It is the biggest public service delivery department in the UK and serves over 20 million customers.

DWP is a ministerial department, supported by 13 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions

result.title: European Social Fund

extras.value: http://www.dwp.gov.uk/esf/news/esf-booklet-2012.shtml    Not due to be released. Contains personal and sensitive data. Will be reviewed in the light of demand and prioritisation.
